snippet: In Trisha Brown’s “Astral Converted,” Tuesday night at the Park Avenue Armory, the performers danced with darkness around and above them, alone in the cosmos.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance by the Trisha Brown Dance Company at the Park Avenue Armory.
lead_paragraph: In Trisha Brown’s “Astral Converted,” Tuesday night at the Park Avenue Armory, the performers danced with darkness around and above them, alone in the cosmos.

headline.seo: ‘Astral Converted’ by Trisha Brown at Park Avenue Armory
headline.main: From the Darkness, Silvery Bodies Shimmer Like Tinsel in the Night
headline.print_headline: From the Darkness, Silvery Bodies Shimmer Like Tinsel in the Night
